Welcome to ECM1400 Coursework 3’s documentation!¶

Main module¶

This is the main module for the alarm program, it is an alarm system that gets the latest news, weather and covid updates and displays this on a webpage for the user it also allows the user to set alarms and choose whether they want the alarm to also say the latest news story and weather

main.index()¶

This module is what connects the modules and then shows this on the webpapge

main.logg()¶

This logs when the python service is closed

main.rootindex()¶

This adds, started, to the logfile and redirects the user to the index page

Alarm module¶

This is a module that organises the alarms, deleting them, adding them, scheduling them, refreshing them and saying them, it depends on the function that’s called

alarm.add_alarm(alarm, name, weather, article, covid, pick_news, pick_weather)¶

This function adds the alarms inputed to the function to the json file of alarms and or adds it to the scheduler depends on conditions

alarm.end()¶

This function loads the alarm json file and returns the alarms in it

alarm.print_job_name(alarm, name, weather, article, covid)¶

This function takes in input strings and then says them with pyttsx3

alarm.refresh(covid, articles, weather)¶

This function will update the alarms with the latest covid,weather&news

alarm.remove_alarm(title, status=False)¶

This function opens the json file for the alarms and then it loops through the file until the title is the same and it removes that alarm

alarm.write_json(data, alarm)¶

This function opens the alarm json file and then adds the date passed to the function to the file

Covid Api call¶

This module pulls the releveent information from the covid api

covid.get_covid()¶

This function gets the date for today and gets the key from teh confic json file and it then calls the api and returns the response

News Api call¶

This module is called from the main function to get the json file from the news api website

news.news()¶

This function does the api call to the news website and it gets the api key from the config json file, then it returns the json file from the api call

Organising the covid news and weather api calls¶

This module organises the dictionaries that are inputed, this is the covid, artices and weateher then it puts these all in a json file. After this it reads from the file and checks each item against another json file with the notifications that have been delted, and if it isn’t in there it is added to the list that is returned The remove notification adds the notification that is removed to the seen file

organise_dictionaries.org_func(covid, weather, articles)¶

This function takes in the 3 dictionsaries covid, weather & articles and then it formats them and returns them in one list

organise_dictionaries.remove_notification(title)¶

This function will remove a notification from the notifications json file

organise_dictionaries.write_json(data)¶

This function opens the notification json file and then adds the data passed to the function to the file

Time conversions module¶

This is a time module that converts the format hhmmss to seconds and also holds to log function

time_conversions.current_date()¶

returns the current date

time_conversions.current_time_hhmm()¶

returns the current tim eof the system in the format hhmm

time_conversions.hhmm_to_seconds(hhmm: str) → int¶

converts hours minutes to seconds

time_conversions.hhmmss_to_seconds(hhmmss: str) → int¶

returns the input time (hhmmss) in seconds

time_conversions.hours_to_minutes(hours: str) → int¶

Converts hours to minutes

time_conversions.log(text)¶

This function logs text to the specified log file

time_conversions.minutes_to_seconds(minutes: str) → int¶

Converts minutes to seconds

Weather Api call¶

This module is called from the main function to get the json file from the weather api website

weather.weathers()¶

This function does the api call to the website and it gets the api key from the config json file, then it returns the json file from the api call
